vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
βῆμα· πρόβατα,
[Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: judicial court, judge’s seat; this can refer to human or divine judgment
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
judicial court, judge’s seat; this can refer to human or divine judgment
a step, footstep, foot-breadth, space to set the foot on, Acts 7:5; an elevated place ascended by steps, tribunal, throne, judicial court, judge’s seat Mt. 27:19; Acts 12:21
vocabInfos._es_Definition: tribunal judicial, lugar de juicio, corte ; espacio suficiente para un pie (HCH.7:5) ;
